text: Nancy E. Dick (born July 22, 1930) is an American politician. She was the 41st Lieutenant Governor of Colorado. from 1979 to 1987 while Governor Richard Lamm. She was Colorado's first female lieutenant governor.State of Colorado:Lt. Gov. Dick She is a Democrat. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Lieutenant Governors of Colorado Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Nancy E. Dick
